title: irukkinrEn abhayam
sahitya:
irukkinrEn abhayam koDukkinrEn enru shollAyO OhO ellAm vallAyE


anupallavi

  Arukkum puNNilE analiTTa pAvi pOl ayyO ulagennai allar paDuttumpOdu


caraNam    aravum puliyum pOlE AtkaL varuginrAr amaidiyaik-keDuttingE allal viLaikkinrAr
iravum paghalum unnai ezhudi ezhudip-pugahz idaya nEsarukkinda gati varalAghumO
dEhamarandavarkku mOhappazhiyEnO dIpattai shuTrilum sAyap-puyalEnO
dAham parugum pOdu taTTi viDvadEnO tayangit-tavikkinrEn dayAparat-tandaiyE
